issue.title: tw.yahoo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://tw.yahoo.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftw.yahoo.com%2F) ### Comment > 請問用了ADGUARD, YAHOO首頁廣告留白是甚麼原因 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/jacq50xtd6o084wwkc4wosckkcco0gknsu2xu54740.png?nc=1)

Web of Trust (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-wot/1.0/wot.user.js) Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | surfshark ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=1.15&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29%2CWeb%2520of%2520Trust%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-wot%2F1.0%2Fwot.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.3.4.17.18.19.20.21.22.208.224.255.256.257&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.20.3+%284994%29&referrer=&scheme_version=2&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.flash=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.java=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.referrer=tw.yahoo.com&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&stealth.user_agent=&stealth.webrtc=true&stealth.x_client=true&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26100.0&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F137.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36+Edg%2F137.0.0.0&win.wfp=true)
